verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Oh, Shall we lose the harvest
And let man go His way
The fields left unattended

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Can have no harvest day?
So shall we work to gather
And strive to bear the yield
Shall we lose the harvest or toil
to reap the field

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
The fields are so white
But so few will labor
Awaiting the harvest
The fields all waste away

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
And someone must toil
or it will not be gathered
Safe in God's store house
Before it is too late

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
When God calls us home
And we stand before Him
How can we deny that
We had our chance today

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
He'll show us the field
The sight will remind us
That we had our chance now
To go and to give and pray

verse.name: c1c
verse.lines:
Oh, Shall we lose the harvest
And let man go His way
The fields left unattended
Can have no harvest day?
So shall we work to gather

verse.name: c1d
verse.lines:
And strive to bear the yield
Shall we lose the harvest or toil
to reap the field
Oh, shall we lose the harvest or toil
to reap the field
The world is the field (God's field)
